casebody.data:
Walter THOMAS, as Administrator of the Estate of Willa Mae Thomas, and in his own right, Petitioner
v.
Nathaniel R. EVANS, III, M.D. & Jefferson University Physicians & Thomas Jefferson University Hospital, Respondents No. 124 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 24, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 24th day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
